title: Movie Site using TMDB API
description: A responsive movie browser built with React and Vite using TMDB API for data and Appwrite for database and user management.

title: Ceylon Wear Ecommerce Site
description: A full-featured ecommerce platform built with React and Vite, supporting online payments via Stripe. CI/CD integration and MongoDB database with secure user authentication and Redux for state management.
